dmca.title: Singapore Apartment Listing Requests Removal of Infringing Material
dmca.body:
Bangkok Friday, March 12, 2004

Infringement Notification

Hello,

I am [private], I.T. Director of Moveandstay.com and I want to report a copyright infringement.

This website: www.asiaxpat.com has grabbed ALL the content (text, pictures, part of layout) of our website to put on their page:

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.moveandstay.com/singapore/ (all serviced apartments pages)

2. Identification of the material that is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above:

Example 1 in Singapore:

a.	Go to http://www.asiaxpat.com.sg/property/serviced.asp 
b.	b. Click on "Treetops Executive Residences" 
c.	c. See the result

COPY: 
http://www.asiaxpat.com.sg/property/treetops_executive_residences/ 
ORIGINAL: 
http://www.moveandstay.com/singapore/apartments_description.asp?id=62

Example 2 in Singapore:

a.	Go to http://www.asiaxpat.com.sg/property/serviced.asp
b.	Click on "Fraser Place Serviced Residences" 
c.	See the result

COPY: 
http://www.asiaxpat.com.sg/property/fraser_place_serviced_residences/ 
ORIGINAL:
http://www.moveandstay.com/singapore/apartments_description.asp?id=245

This can be repeated for all serviced apartments pages on Singapore listing.

3. You can contact me at [private] or [private]

4. How to contact the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material: send email to [private]@asiaxpat.com

5. Statements:

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
